assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: N Hoogerbrugge is scientific consultant to AstraZeneca since June 2014. HP Eikesdal has received PARP inhibitors free of charge from AbbVie and AstraZeneca for use in clinical trials in patients with breast cancer. The other authors declare no conflict of interest.
